feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ops/aas with minio gateway by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15587
  • Remove mocking from sqlUtils.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15574
  • Revert "[Revert] store koa sessions in redis instead of cookies" by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15605
  • Fix for automation traversal by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15611

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.16...3.4.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve types around nodemailer by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15612
  • Support filtering relationships by _id by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15609
  • Fix bug with branches when no conditions are set. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15608
  • Remove view enrichment unit test, covered by integration tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15610
  • Test ElasticSearch integration against a real ElasticSearch docker container by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15624
  • QR Code scanner zoom capabilities by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15627
  • Remove mocks from static.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15626
  • Fix for autocompletion evaluation in the builder by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15628

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.17...3.4.18

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update apt cache before installing python3-certbot-nginx by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15636

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.18...3.4.19

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.20
entry.content:

  • Revert "Improve types around nodemailer" by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15637

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.19...3.4.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix MSSQL tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15639
  • Improve typing around plugins. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15619
  • Skip ancestors validation on plugins components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15641
  • Improve types around nodemailer (take 2) by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15638

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.20...3.4.21
